crocodile st in chain-2 space fpdc around same fpdc in round 3 as previous fpdc skip 3 st you are skipping the single_crochet in the corner and the next 2 fpdc single_crochet in next 2 st three times fpdc around fpdc in round 3 skip 3 st 5 double_crochet chain 3 5 double_crochet in chain-2 space fpdc around same fpdc in round 3 as previous fpdc skip 3 st slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off 12 fpdc 40 double_crochet 16 single_crochet 4 chain-3 space round 6 work in third loop or back loop except for working in chain space and post st join color b with single_crochet in tlo or blo of second double_crochet of any crocodile st group single_crochet in next 3 st 3 single_crochet in copyright 2025 julie yeager designs see all at www julieyeagerdesigns com or my ravelry store contact me via e-mail at julieyeagerdesigns@gmail com chain-3 space single_crochet in tlo or blo next 4 st skip 4 st the double_crochet and fpdc of round 5 and the first two fpdc of round 4 fpdc in next 2 fpdc in round 4 skip fpdc fpdc in next 2 fpdc in round 4 skip 4 st two fpdc in round 4 and the fpdc and double_crochet of round 5 single_crochet in tlo or blo next 4 st four times omitting last 4 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet do not fasten_off 16 fpdc 44 single_crochet round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 3 double_crochet in next st
